page.title: 13RECREATION AND LEISURE.
page.content: Few of our sample garden for pleasure. A large proportion stated that they only do the necessary weeding and lawn -mowing;around two hours per week.A few adults with larger gardens or allotments do a great deal more. Apart from a 5% sample who are renovating older property,most adults do only minor Do-It-Yourself jobs. Pensioners generally prefer to use a familiar local tradesman. Hobbies listed in the survey included keeping pigeons and poultry,cooking, dancing,photography,playing cards, sewing and embroidery,beer brewing, caravaning,collecting antiques,bingo, singing,playing records and philately. Almost all active adults walk for pleasure and exercise.Swimming is a distant second in popularity,followed by keep-fit,badminton,bowls,cycling, golf,squash and water-skiing.
